resources.string:
Welcome to our app!
Here, you can share completely anonymously, express your secrets that weigh you down. This is a space where you can tell jokes, blurt out thoughts and be completely free.

Acceptance of Terms: By accessing or using our app, you agree to these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy.
User Account: By creating an account on our app, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login information and for all activities that occur under your account.
Changes to the Terms: We may update or modify these Terms of Use occasionally. We will notify you of any significant changes and the date of the last update. Your continued use of the app after the changes indicates your acceptance of these changes.
I have read and agreed to the terms and conditions
